name: Archangel's Staff
tooltip:
Archangel's Staff

Cost: 3000
+60 Ability Power
+500 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus ability power equal to 3% bonus mana.

UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
